name: Carlton Sofa
description: The inspiration behind Carlton is found in the late 60s and early 70s. Combined with a modern comfort, this results in a sofa with a contemporary, timeless look that fits the modern trends. Extremely soft cushions provide excellent seating comfort and make the sofa very comfortable. The Carlton sofa is constructed on a strong frame which allows for a slim, durable structure that enhances the horizontal look. A relaxed atmosphere is achieved with large and soft cushions creating an inviting look.
